oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sevier, George W. Presenting the sword of Gov. John Sevier to the State of Tenn. This sword was presentedto John Sevier by the State of North Carolina inrecognition of his gallant conduct at the Battle of King's Mountain, Oct. 6, 1780
